info.name: 石丹
info.profile: Dan Shi is a postdoctoral researcher at Nanjing University of Science and Technology, with Professor Tang Jinhui as her co-supervisor. Her main research interests include big data mining, multimedia analysis, and retrieval. She has published 10 papers in international journals and conferences, including top computer science journals such as IEEE TIP, IEEE TKDE, IEEE TCYB, and IEEE TNNLS. She was awarded the 2022 Excellent Master's Thesis Award by the Chinese Association of Automation (CAA) and the Third Prize for Provincial-level Innovation Achievements, among other honors. She serves as a reviewer for international conferences such as ACM MM 2024 and AAAI 2025, as well as international journals like ACM TOIS and ACM TOMM.
info.direction: 大数据挖掘、多媒体分析与检索
info.profile_c: 石丹，南京理工大学博士后，合作导师为唐金辉教授。主要研究方向包括大数据挖掘、多媒体分析与检索。在国际期刊和会议上发表论文10篇，其中包括IEEE TIP、IEEE TKDE、IEEE TCYB、IEEE TNNLS等计算机领域顶级期刊。曾荣获2022年中国自动化学会（CAA）优秀硕士学位论文奖、省级创新成果三等奖等荣誉。担任ACM MM 2024、AAAI 2025等国际会议及ACM TOIS、ACM TOMM等国际期刊的审稿人。
